Preterit.turoyo: b-i=ṭəbbiye d-aʕ=ʕărabmofaqleəšmo d-məšḥo w-mfašalle b-ṭasəke, w-maḥətkube w xarnufatmədonehawxa, w mčaqčaqle u=məšḥomšaḥallekweleiḏe 615; 29/155 [MT]; 60/252; maqəṯle-le əšmo d-nuromaḥatleəšmo d-qaršomšaḥalleqarʕe d-u=sayfomoqaḏledukṯe d-u=ǧərḥokwele
translations: ‘He made fire, put some dry grass on it, heated up the sword head and cauterized his wound’ 78/58;
